Quickstrike:





Quickstrike chuckled at KitKat. "Maybe yer right." He leaned back and 
watched as she threw up another rock and fired at it. Now it was his turn. 
He wasn't that into it. After she threw another into the air, he waited 
until it was a few inches from the ground, then he fired. The rock split 
into two, and pieces shattered from the side as they both hit the ground. It 
wasn't his best, but it wasn't a real enemy. He was used to fighting with 
other bots, even to spar with.

He wanted to do something to entertain himself. KitKat kept him occupied. At 
least she tried for conversation. He grin appeared on his mouth plate. "Ah 
gotta idea, let' give Sinester and Sinesis uh nickname. Ah'm bettin' on Dumb 
and Dumber."
